name: SHMUP game (game dev project, grade 12)
description:
A SHMUP (short for shoot 'em up) game where the player is a plane fighting with planes from another nation.

Controls :

--Arrow key to move

--X to shoot bullet

--C to fire missile (There is a reload time)

--Z to use special move (collect 10 blue coin to use special move)

--Press tab to pause

--There is a BOSS that will appear when you score reached 500!!
